snippet: The Circuit de la Sarthe, home of the 24 Hours of Le Mans since 1923, remains the challenge today that it has been for generations of drivers.
lead_paragraph: The Circuit de la Sarthe, home of the 24 Hours of Le Mans since 1923, remains the challenge today that it has been for generations of drivers.

headline.main: Many Story Lines, One Classic Racetrack
headline.content_kicker: Special Report: 24 Hours of Le Mans
headline.print_headline: Many Story Lines, One Classic Racetrack
